description: Get news articles relevant for a given query.
name: web_search.newssearch

improvement: The current tool name and description may not effectively convey the benefits of using a news search tool. The new tool name and description aim to improve this by emphasizing the relevance and timeliness of the search results.
description: Get the most relevant and up-to-date news articles for your query, sourced from a wide range of top news sources around the world.
name: web_search.relevantnews
